content: **materials required ** - yarn in yellow and orange - 3 5mm hook - 5mm safety eyes - stitch marker yarn needle scissors - stuffing - keychain piece optional **finished size ** using the materials listed the duck measures about 5 5cm tall and 4cm wide - this pattern does not require sewing and is beginner friendly -this is an original pattern written by annie rose designs you may not copy sell rewrite modify or publish this pattern as your own
